UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of a peptide derived from the heptad repeat 2 region of the porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV) spike glycoprotein that is capable of suppressing PEDV entry and inducing neutralizing antibodies.
Literature.Author: Zhao P, Wang B, Ji CM, Cong X, Wang M, Huang YW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDcoV)(IC50 REP=4.77µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma Huh7(0-10% Cytotoxicity=40µM)
